CalculatorSolution

Refund Policy

Our commitment to customer satisfaction

1. Overview

CalculatorSolution is committed to providing quality calculator tools and resources. This policy outlines our refund procedures and conditions for paid services and premium features.

Current Status: CalculatorSolution currently offers free calculators with no charges. This policy will apply if we introduce premium features or paid services in the future.

2. Free Services

The majority of CalculatorSolution calculators are available completely free of charge. No refunds are applicable to free services since no payment is required.

Benefits of Free Calculators:

  • No subscription required
  • No registration needed
  • No hidden charges
  • No payment methods requested
  • Complete access to all free calculators
  • No time limitations

3. Premium Services & Features

If CalculatorSolution introduces premium services or premium calculator features in the future, the following refund policy will apply:

3.1 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee

All paid services and premium features come with a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can request a full refund within 30 days of purchase for any reason.

3.2 Refund Process

To request a refund:

  1. Contact support@calculatorsolution.com with your order ID
  2. Provide reason for refund request (optional)
  3. Include your account email address
  4. Request will be reviewed and processed within 5 business days
  5. Funds will be returned to original payment method within 5-10 business days

3.3 Refund Eligibility

You are eligible for a refund if:

  • You request refund within 30 days of purchase
  • Your account is in good standing
  • You haven't violated our Terms of Service
  • Your refund request is made in good faith

3.4 Ineligible for Refunds

Refunds will NOT be processed if:

  • Refund request is made after 30 days
  • Account violates Terms of Service
  • Content was accessed multiple times
  • Service was accessed after refund request
  • Refund is requested for duplicate/accidental purchase (partial refund only)
  • Account shows signs of fraud or abuse
  • Payment was fraudulent or unauthorized

4. Subscription Cancellation

If CalculatorSolution offers subscription services, the following cancellation policy applies:

4.1 Cancellation Procedure

To cancel subscription:

  1. Log into your account on CalculatorSolution
  2. Navigate to Account Settings â†’ Subscriptions
  3. Click "Cancel Subscription"
  4. Choose reason for cancellation (optional feedback)
  5. Confirm cancellation

Alternatively: Email support@calculatorsolution.com to cancel via email

4.2 Refunds for Subscriptions

  • Monthly Subscriptions: Cancel anytime; refund available if cancelled within 7 days of initial purchase
  • Annual Subscriptions: 30-day refund guarantee from purchase date
  • Partial Month: If cancelled mid-month, no refund for partial month (access continues until month end)
  • Early Cancellation: No refunds for cancellation beyond refund window, though cancellation takes effect immediately

4.3 Cancellation Timing

  • Cancellation takes effect immediately
  • Recurring charges stop after cancellation
  • Access to premium features continues until end of current billing period if no refund
  • If refund is issued, access may terminate immediately

5. Duplicate Charges

Accidental duplicate charges:

  • We monitor for duplicate transactions
  • If duplicate charge detected, automatic refund will be issued within 2 business days
  • You can report duplicate charges to support@calculatorsolution.com with screenshot of duplicate charges
  • Refund will be processed as soon as duplicate is confirmed

6. Unauthorized Charges

If you identify unauthorized charges:

  • Contact support@calculatorsolution.com immediately with details
  • Provide proof of unauthorized access (screenshot, email, etc.)
  • We will investigate within 24 hours
  • Full refund will be issued if charge is confirmed unauthorized
  • Account security will be reviewed and enhanced

7. Refund Methods

Refunds are processed to the original payment method:

  • Credit/Debit Cards: 5-10 business days
  • PayPal: 2-5 business days
  • Bank Transfer: 5-10 business days
  • Digital Wallets: 3-7 business days

Note: Processing times depend on your bank/payment provider. We recommend contacting your bank if refund doesn't appear within stated timeframe.

8. Failed Transactions

If your payment fails:

  • You will receive notification of failed payment
  • No charges will be applied for failed transactions
  • Service access will be suspended until payment succeeds
  • You can retry payment without additional fees

9. Refund Status Check

To check refund status:

  1. Email support@calculatorsolution.com with order ID
  2. Include refund request date
  3. Include your registered email
  4. We'll respond within 24 hours with status update

10. Declined Refund Appeals

If your refund request is declined:

  • You will receive email explaining reason for decline
  • You have 7 days to appeal the decision
  • Submit appeal with additional information to support@calculatorsolution.com
  • Appeals are reviewed by management team
  • Final decision will be provided within 5 business days

11. Chargeback Policy

Important regarding chargebacks:

  • Chargebacks should be a last resort after contacting us
  • Multiple chargebacks may result in account suspension/termination
  • Filing chargeback may delay refund processing
  • We may take legal action for fraudulent chargebacks
  • Chargeback fees may apply to your account

Always contact us first before initiating chargeback.

12. Special Cases

12.1 Defective Service

If a premium service is found to be defective or non-functional:

  • Full refund available at any time
  • No time limit for refund eligibility
  • Additional compensation may be offered

12.2 Technical Issues

If technical issues prevent service access:

  • We will attempt to resolve issue within 24 hours
  • If unresolved, full refund or service replacement offered
  • No extended troubleshooting required before refund

12.3 Material Misrepresentation

If service differs materially from description:

  • Full refund available regardless of time elapsed
  • No questions asked refund policy applies
  • Additional compensation may be considered

13. Taxes and Fees

Regarding taxes and fees:

  • Refunds include applicable taxes and fees
  • No additional fees deducted from refunds
  • Payment processing fees are not refundable
  • Currency conversion fees may apply to international refunds

14. No Refund for Services Rendered

Regarding services already used:

  • If service was fully accessed and used, refund eligibility may be limited
  • Extensive use of service beyond trial period may disqualify refund
  • Refund evaluation considers usage level and duration
  • Trial periods are separate from refund guarantees

15. Non-Refundable Items

The following are generally NOT refundable:

  • Advertising or promotional credits (once issued)
  • Bonus features or promotional offers
  • Expired or expired subscriptions
  • Custom or personalized services
  • API access after extensive use

16. Promotional and Discount Codes

Regarding promotional purchases:

  • Refunds for promotional purchases calculated at promotional price
  • If promotion expires, full refund available
  • Unused promotional credits refundable within 30 days
  • Limited time offers not refundable after expiration

17. Contact Information

For refund inquiries and requests:

  • Email: support@calculatorsolution.com
  • Subject Line: "Refund Request - [Order ID]"
  • Website: https://calculatorsolution.com/contact.html
  • Response Time: Within 24 business hours

18. Policy Changes

CalculatorSolution reserves the right to modify this refund policy at any time. Changes will be effective immediately for new purchases and within 30 days for existing services. We will notify users of significant changes via email.

19. Entire Agreement

This refund policy, together with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, constitutes the entire agreement regarding refunds and purchase terms.

20. Disputes and Governing Law

Any disputes regarding refunds will be governed by the laws stated in our Terms of Service. Both parties agree to attempt resolution through CalculatorSolution customer support before pursuing legal action.

ðŸ’° SATISFACTION GUARANTEED

Currently: All CalculatorSolution calculators are FREE. No payment required.

Future Paid Services: If premium features are introduced, we guarantee 30-day money-back guarantee on all purchases.

For any refund questions, contact: support@calculatorsolution.com
